price: Йўқ! Биз унинг бармоқ учларини ҳам асл ҳолига келтиришга Қодирмиз.
arabic: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُۥ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: balā qādirīna ʿalā an nusawwiya banānahu
